## RowsOptions interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface RowsOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [format?](./tables.rowsoptions.format.md) |  | Record&lt;string, ((d: any) =&gt; any) \| undefined&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Map of custom formatting functions per column. |
|  [skipHeader?](./tables.rowsoptions.skipheader.md) |  | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Indicates whether to skip the column headers as first row. |
|  [stringify?](./tables.rowsoptions.stringify.md) |  | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Indicates whether to save each cell value as a string. Note that this just wraps in a template and does not attempt any formatting. |
